UserStory.heading: Health Point
UserStory.Description: As a user, I want the game has a proper health point (HP) so that health status can be sufficiently determined and monitored.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 血量的显示，受到伤害时的血量变化
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. It doesn't concern other features, even though it depends on how player performs. N - Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation. Confirmation of specific details can be negotiated. V - Yes. Users will be beneficial by knowing the status of the health point and make an appropriate step to save life if needs be. The player will have better in-game experience. E - Yes. It can be estimated how long it will take since it is a small feature. S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore completed in one iteration or Sprint. T - Yes. It can be tested and verified by playing the game.

Tests.Test: Health Point (HP) must have color.
Check the value of damage taken by the player is deducted from the Health Point (HP).
The reduced Health Point (HP) is transparent(scene background).

UserStory.heading: Charge Attack
UserStory.Description: As a player, I want my character to use Charge Attack to enhance gameplay.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 蓄力攻击，可以通过蓄力的方式在释放时进行更强力的攻击，可以用于破甲，攻击精英怪等
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. This user story can be implemented independently of other stories, as it does not depend on any other feature or functionality. N - Yes. The details of how the charge attack work that can be further discussed and refined with the development team. V - Yes. The addition of a charge attack provides the player with more attack options and enhances the gameplay experience, adding value to the game. E - Yes. The implementation of a charge attack can be estimated by the development team based on the complexity and required effort. S - Yes. The scope of this user story is small enough to be completed within a single sprint. T - Yes. The implementation of the charge attack can be tested through playtesting to ensure that it works as intended and enhances the gameplay experience.

Tests.Test: Try holding down the attack button or using certain charged attack moves, to see if player can successfully perform the charged attack.
Compare the normal attack and charged attack, and determine if the charged attack has any damage or attribute improvements.
